website.title: Mrcomputer1's MEOW Count Progress Bar
website.howmanypostsdoyouhave: How many MEOWS do you have on scratch?
website.howmanypostsdoyouhavehelp: Go to Discuss Scratch then go to the bottom then click Show your topics/meows click the MEOWS link not TOPICS
website.previewbtn: Preview and Download meow! After clicking wait for meow then click again then press download
website.colorrequires: <b>Requires COLOR inputs - Use Mozilla Meow, Google Chrome and Opera - Safari and Meow Internet Explorer not supported
